"Ah, good timing. Here... Take this.": "It's not a big deal, just take it."
"You seem surprised. It's just... I've caused a lot of trouble for you, and you've done so much for me."
"This is my apology, and my thanks..."
"A-are you happy now?! Just go away and do a mission or something!"
"Received <yellow><%skit_text><c> from Yucreta."
"Received <yellow><%skit_text><c> from Yucreta."
"Received <yellow><%skit_text><c> from Yucreta."
"Received <yellow><%skit_text><c> from Yucreta."
"Received <yellow><%skit_text><c> from Yucreta."
"Received <yellow><%skit_text><c> from Yucreta."
"Received <yellow><%skit_text><c> from Yucreta."
"Received <yellow><%skit_text><c> from Yucreta."
"Received <yellow><%skit_text><c> from Yucreta."
"Received <yellow><%skit_text><c> from Yucreta."
"Received <yellow><%skit_text><c> from Yucreta."
"It feels kind of strange to be here on the ARKS Ship."
"I'm pretty sure people are looking at me funny, but there's no helping that. I was your enemy, after all."

"Look, I'm fine. But, uh...
Thanks for checking up on me."
"A-anyway...! If you have time to stand around chatting with me, you should be using that time to relax properly. Take care of yourself, OK?"
"Hmm... Oh, you're back."
"Your physical condition looks... fine. Aurora doesn't have anything to say, so I guess the cleansing went well?"
"I appreciate you coming to see me, but you should go talk to the others. Everyone wants to meet you."

"アウロラ？\u3000なんでも武器姿の方が
本人的に楽みたいで、最近はもっぱら
その姿のままのんびりしてるわよ。"

"人型になってた時もあったけど
見た目的に目立つからね。
質問攻めにうんざりしたみたい。"

"……反論もないし、今も寝てるわね。
ま、そのうち会えるんじゃない？"
"Didn't take long for things to get exciting around here once you were woken up."
"You're a good person, but you do tend to plough ahead without thinking whether you're getting the people around you into trouble..."
"I'm not complaining, it worked out for me. Just, please try to be careful."

"人が相手……か。
今更ためらうようなものでもないわ。"

"ハルコタンだってアムドゥスキアだって
相手は意志ある存在だったでしょ。
それと同じだと、あたしは思うわ。"

"……何にせよ、気にしすぎるなって事。
主に戦う相手は、幻創種なんだからね。"

"So, her embodied weapon broke...
I didn't know that could happen."
"They're manifestations of their user's heart, so maybe her weapon breaking shows her heart was broken too..."

"折れたのは武器じゃなくて心。
だから、心が戻れば武器も戻る。
さらに強さと輝きを増して、ね。"

"とんでもない荒療治だけども
そのヒツギって子にとっては
越えるべき壁だったんじゃないかしら。"

"自分の心、本当の心と向き合うのって
本当に、辛くて大変だからね。"
"We didn't pick up any signs of Dark Falz on that kid. As far as I'm concerned, he isn't one any more."
"That's just my point of view, anyway. I don't know what ARKS thinks about it officially."
"Nobody should let other people decide who they are for them. I wonder what Aru thinks he is?"

"……アルって子、戻って来たんでしょ？
良かったわね、助け出せて。"

"口ではいろいろ言ってると思うけど
内心はとっても不安だったはずよ。
いっそう優しくしてあげるといいわ。"
"So in the end, we were just cleaning up after the Photoners on Earth, too."
"I've asked Aurora about it, but she claims not to remember much. To be honest, I don't mind not getting into it."
"Mostly she just remembers how beautiful or ugly things were back then. She didn't exactly pick up on a lot of important details."
"Rescuing someone from Dark Falz possession is one thing, but trying to save the host of the [Profound Darkness]? ARKS must be crazy."
"Still, this might just be crazy enough to work. I'll help out in any way I can."

"Welcome back.
...I wasn't worried. Everyone else seemed relaxed about your chances."

"Even Aurora was sure you'd be safe.
...Not that I care what she thinks."

"A lot of people have been saying that Darker appearance rates are down...
Is that really true?"

"You know they could just be building up their forces, right?
...I hate to spoil the mood, but we have to consider every possibility."
"...Not one word out of you about what happened back there. Especially not to Afin."
"...I'm not embarrassed. I just don't want him to worry about me. He's such a nuisance when he's worried."
"...Shiva, Goddess of Demise. I asked Aurora about her, but she'd never heard the name before."
"She's similar to the Twenty Gods of the Photoners, but she's unique. She was intended to be sacrificed from the day she was born."

"I'm sympathetic to her situation...
But that doesn't give her the right to take revenge on the entire world."
"I've spent a while with the Information Division, having Aurora tell them everything she knows."
"Unfortunately, she couldn't give them any leads on how to defeat Shiva. I hope we can find something soon..."

"We don't even know when she's going to attack us.
...It's the waiting I can't stand."

"We've been working so hard on strengthening ourselves, but they just walked right into the core...
...We can't let them get away with this."
"And Shiva's followers are dangerous too. That Mitra girl has the ability to disguise herself as our allies."
"...But we can't waste time on mourning. Our only hope is to search Amduscia for whatever Sara believes we will find there."

"Once again, you've restored hope to us all...
Even when I gave up, you never did."
"That's how you've always been. Thanks to that, we're back on stable footing. And I... I won't ever give up again."
"This is the turning point. It's time I stiffened my resolve."
"According to Aurora, the two Gods accompanying Shiva were innocents who got dragged into the Photoners' schemes..."
"...It must have been hard for Harriet. Watching everyone she believed in become corrupted, unable to look away..."
"...The power of Shiva is unbelievable. But the others aren't on the same level."
"We aren't a match for their power yet, but I think we're making progress."
"...So we'll do what I've always done. We'll believe in you and fight."
"Everything else that happened aside, you've defeated one of Shiva's most dangerous followers."
"I can't speak for anyone else, but it seems like we're making progress to me."
"I heard we've finally got a lead on how to defeat Shiva."
"...I'm still worried. But we're definitely making progress. Even if we're forced to take one step back, we've already taken three steps forward."
"The situation is still tough, but I have hope that we'll make it through."
"I always believed in you, no matter how bad things looked, but still..."

"None of us were even able to make a dent in Shiva's defences before...
I still can't quite believe we've won."
"...Thank you. You've made everyone's hopes and wishes come true. You're a miracle-worker."
